## StringEncoding.nsStringEncoding property

The Cocoa encoding constant that is the closest mapping to this [StringEncoding](./iconv-corefoundation.stringencoding.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly nsStringEncoding: number | null;
```

## Remarks

This is the return value of the Core Foundation function [CFStringConvertEncodingToNSStringEncoding](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/corefoundation/1543046-cfstringconvertencodingtonsstrin?language=objc)<!-- -->.
